description.english: Why would there be achievements if there wasn't more to this game?
description.german: Warum sollte es Achievements geben, wenn das Spiel nicht mehr zu bieten hätte?
description.spanish: ¿Por qué habría logros si el juego no tuviera nada más?
description.french: Pourquoi y aurait-il des réalisations si ce jeu n'était pas plus intéressant ?
description.italian: Perché ci sarebbero gli obiettivi se non ci fosse qualcosa di più in questo gioco?
description.koreana: 이 게임에 더 많은 것이 없다면 왜 업적이 있을까요?
description.dutch: Waarom zouden er achievements zijn als er niet meer in dit spel zat?
description.finnish: Miksi tässä pelissä olisi saavutuksia, jos siinä ei olisi muutakin?
description.japanese: このゲームにこれ以上のものがなかったら、なぜ実績があるのだろう？
description.portuguese: Porque é que haveria conquistas se o jogo não fosse mais do que isso?
description.czech: Proč by ve hře byly achievementy, kdyby v ní nebylo víc?
description.greek: Γιατί θα υπήρχαν επιτεύγματα αν δεν υπήρχαν περισσότερα σε αυτό το παιχνίδι;
description.norwegian: Hvorfor skulle det være prestasjoner hvis det ikke var noe mer i spillet?
description.schinese: 如果游戏没有更多内容，为什么会有成就？
description.swedish: Varför skulle det finnas prestationer om det inte fanns något mer i det här spelet?
description.russian: Зачем нужны достижения, если в этой игре нет ничего особенного?
description.turkish: Why would there be achievements if there wasn't more to this game?
description.vietnamese: Why would there be achievements if there wasn't more to this game?
description.latam: Why would there be achievements if there wasn't more to this game?
description.brazilian: Por que haveria conquistas se o jogo não fosse mais do que isso?
description.indonesian: Untuk apa ada pencapaian jika tidak ada yang lebih dari game ini?
description.tchinese: 如果這個遊戲沒有更多，為什麼會有成就呢？

description.english: Chase the switch around the room
description.german: Jage den Schalter durch den Raum
description.spanish: Persigue el interruptor por la habitación
description.french: Poursuivre l'interrupteur dans la pièce
description.italian: Inseguire l'interruttore per tutta la stanza
description.dutch: Jaag de schakelaar door de kamer
description.japanese: スイッチを追いかけ回す
description.greek: Κυνηγήστε τον διακόπτη μέσα στο δωμάτιο
description.norwegian: Jage bryteren rundt i rommet
description.swedish: Jaga brytaren runt i rummet
description.turkish: Chase the switch around the room
description.vietnamese: Chase the switch around the room
description.latam: Chase the switch around the room

description.english: Yes, there is 49 switches now. Groundbreaking stuff right here.
description.german: Ja, es gibt jetzt 49 Schalter. Eine bahnbrechende Sache genau hier.
description.spanish: Sí, ahora hay 49 interruptores. Cosas innovadoras aquí.
description.french: Oui, il y a maintenant 49 interrupteurs. Il s'agit là d'une véritable révolution.
description.italian: Sì, ora ci sono 49 interruttori. Roba all'avanguardia, proprio qui.
description.koreana: 네, 이제 49 개의 스위치가 있습니다. 바로 여기에 획기적인 기능이 있습니다.
description.dutch: Ja, er zijn nu 49 schakelaars. Baanbrekend spul hier.
description.finnish: Kyllä, nyt on 49 kytkintä. Uraauurtavaa tavaraa juuri tässä.
description.japanese: そう、今は49個のスイッチがある。画期的なことだ。
description.portuguese: Sim, agora há 49 interruptores. Coisa inovadora aqui mesmo.
description.czech: Ano, nyní je k dispozici 49 přepínačů. To je převratná věc.
description.greek: Ναι, υπάρχουν 49 διακόπτες τώρα. Πρωτοποριακά πράγματα εδώ.
description.norwegian: Ja, det er 49 brytere nå. Dette er banebrytende.
description.schinese: 是的，现在有 49 个开关。这可是开创性的东西。
description.swedish: Ja, det finns 49 växlar nu. Banbrytande saker här.
description.russian: Да, теперь есть 49 переключателей. Новаторская вещь.
description.turkish: Yes, there is 49 switches now. Groundbreaking stuff right here.
description.vietnamese: Yes, there is 49 switches now. Groundbreaking stuff right here.
description.latam: Yes, there is 49 switches now. Groundbreaking stuff right here.
description.brazilian: Sim, há 49 interruptores agora. Coisa inovadora bem aqui.
description.indonesian: Ya, ada 49 sakelar sekarang. Hal yang inovatif di sini.
description.tchinese: 是的，現在有49個交換器。 開創性的東西就在這裡。

description.english: You got rid of them all! Awesome........
description.german: Du bist sie alle losgeworden! Ehrfurchtgebietend........
description.french: Tu t'es débarrassé de tous ! Awesome........
description.italian: Ti sei sbarazzato di tutti! Fantastico........
description.dutch: Je bent ze allemaal kwijt! Geweldig........
description.japanese: あなたは彼ら全員を追い払った！すごい。。。。。
description.greek: Τους ξεφορτώθηκες όλους! Φοβερό........
description.norwegian: Du ble kvitt alle sammen! Fantastisk........
description.schinese: 你把他们都赶走了！真棒.......
description.swedish: Du gjorde dig av med dem alla! Häftigt........
description.russian: Вы избавились от них всех! Потрясающе........
description.turkish: You got rid of them all! Awesome........
description.vietnamese: You got rid of them all! Awesome........
description.latam: You got rid of them all! Awesome........
description.brazilian: Você se livrou de todos eles! Awesome........
description.indonesian: Anda berhasil menyingkirkan mereka semua! Luar biasa........
description.tchinese: 你把他們都除掉了！ 驚人的........

description.english: Did you fall for it?

description.turkish: Did you fall for it?
description.vietnamese: Did you fall for it?
description.latam: Did you fall for it?

displayName.german: Ich glaube, Ihr Wasserhahn ist undicht.

displayName.schinese: 我觉得你的水龙头在漏水。

displayName.brazilian: Acho que sua torneira está vazando.
displayName.tchinese: 我認為你的水龍頭漏水了。

displayName.german: Sie können Ihre Meinung nicht ändern.

displayName.portuguese: Não se pode mudar de ideias.
displayName.brazilian: Você não pode mudar de ideia.
displayName.indonesian: Anda tidak dapat mengubah pikiran Anda.

description.english: What options would you want to change anyways?
description.german: Welche Optionen würden Sie auf jeden Fall ändern wollen?
description.spanish: ¿Qué opciones querría cambiar de todos modos?
description.french: Quelles sont les options que vous souhaiteriez modifier de toute façon ?
description.italian: Quali sono le opzioni che vorreste cambiare in ogni caso?
description.dutch: Welke opties zou je sowieso willen veranderen?
description.japanese: どんなオプションを変えたい？
description.greek: Ποιες επιλογές θα θέλατε να αλλάξετε ούτως ή άλλως;
description.norwegian: Hvilke alternativer ønsker du å endre uansett?
description.schinese: 无论如何，您想要更改哪些选项？
description.swedish: Vilka alternativ skulle du ändå vilja ändra?
description.russian: Какие параметры вы хотели бы изменить в любом случае?
description.turkish: What options would you want to change anyways?
description.vietnamese: What options would you want to change anyways?
description.latam: What options would you want to change anyways?
description.brazilian: Que opções você gostaria de mudar, afinal?
description.indonesian: Opsi apa saja yang ingin Anda ubah?
description.tchinese: 您到底想改變哪些選項？

description.english: You really tried the mouse button? Weird.
description.german: Haben Sie wirklich die Maustaste ausprobiert? Seltsam.
description.spanish: ¿De verdad has probado el botón del ratón? Qué raro.
description.french: Vous avez vraiment essayé le bouton de la souris ? C'est bizarre.
description.italian: Hai davvero provato con il pulsante del mouse? Strano.
description.koreana: 정말 마우스 버튼을 사용해 보셨나요? 이상하네요.
description.dutch: Heb je echt de muisknop geprobeerd? Raar.
description.japanese: 本当にマウスボタンを試したのか？変だ。
description.portuguese: Experimentou mesmo o botão do rato? Estranho.
description.czech: Opravdu jste vyzkoušeli tlačítko myši? Divné.
description.greek: Δοκιμάσατε πραγματικά το κουμπί του ποντικιού; Παράξενο.
description.norwegian: Prøvde du virkelig å trykke på museknappen? Merkelig.
description.schinese: 你真的试过鼠标键？真奇怪
description.swedish: Försökte du verkligen trycka på musknappen? Konstigt.
description.russian: Вы действительно пробовали нажимать кнопку мыши? Странно.
description.turkish: You really tried the mouse button? Weird.
description.vietnamese: You really tried the mouse button? Weird.
description.latam: You really tried the mouse button? Weird.
description.brazilian: Você realmente tentou usar o botão do mouse? Estranho.
description.indonesian: Anda benar-benar mencoba tombol mouse? Aneh.
description.tchinese: 你真的嘗試過滑鼠按鈕嗎？ 詭異的。

description.english: And actually chose to come back?

description.finnish: Ja itse asiassa päätti tulla takaisin?
description.japanese: そして実際に戻ってくることを選んだのか？
description.greek: Και όντως επέλεξε να επιστρέψει;
description.norwegian: Og faktisk valgte å komme tilbake?
description.swedish: Och faktiskt valde att komma tillbaka?
description.turkish: And actually chose to come back?
description.vietnamese: And actually chose to come back?
description.latam: And actually chose to come back?

description.english: Congratulations on completing the game!
description.german: Herzlichen Glückwunsch zum Abschluss des Spiels!
description.french: Félicitations pour avoir terminé le jeu !
description.italian: Congratulazioni per aver completato il gioco!
description.dutch: Gefeliciteerd met het voltooien van het spel!
description.japanese: 試合終了おめでとう！
description.portuguese: Parabéns por ter completado o jogo!
description.greek: Συγχαρητήρια για την ολοκλήρωση του παιχνιδιού!
description.norwegian: Gratulerer med å ha fullført spillet!
description.swedish: Grattis till att ha slutfört spelet!
description.turkish: Congratulations on completing the game!
description.vietnamese: Congratulations on completing the game!
description.latam: Congratulations on completing the game!
description.brazilian: Parabéns por ter concluído o jogo!

description.english: Not you.
description.german: Sie nicht.
description.french: Pas vous.
description.italian: Non tu.
description.dutch: Jij niet.
description.japanese: 君じゃない。
description.greek: Όχι εσύ.
description.norwegian: Ikke du.
description.swedish: Inte du.
description.turkish: Not you.
description.vietnamese: Not you.
description.latam: Not you.

displayName.german: Hören Sie einfach auf, dieses Spiel zu spielen.
displayName.spanish: Deja de jugar a este juego.
displayName.french: Arrêtez de jouer à ce jeu.
displayName.italian: Smettete di giocare a questo gioco.
displayName.japanese: このゲームをやめればいい。
displayName.greek: Σταματήστε να παίζετε αυτό το παιχνίδι.
displayName.norwegian: Bare slutt å spille dette spillet.
displayName.swedish: Sluta bara spela det här spelet.
displayName.russian: Просто перестаньте играть в эту игру.
displayName.brazilian: Simplesmente pare de jogar este jogo.

description.english: Even I feel I am going a bit mad.
description.german: Selbst ich habe das Gefühl, dass ich ein bisschen verrückt werde.
description.spanish: Incluso yo siento que me estoy volviendo un poco loco.
description.french: Même moi, j'ai l'impression de devenir un peu fou.
description.italian: Anche io sento che sto diventando un po' matto.
description.dutch: Zelfs ik heb het gevoel dat ik een beetje gek word.
description.finnish: Jopa minusta tuntuu, että olen tulossa hieman hulluksi.
description.japanese: 私でさえ、少しおかしくなりそうだ。
description.portuguese: Até eu sinto que estou a ficar um pouco louco.
description.czech: I já mám pocit, že se trochu zblázním.
description.greek: Ακόμα και εγώ νιώθω ότι τρελαίνομαι λίγο.
description.norwegian: Selv føler jeg at jeg er i ferd med å bli litt gal.
description.schinese: 连我自己都觉得自己有点疯了。
description.swedish: Till och med jag känner att jag håller på att bli lite galen.
description.russian: Даже мне кажется, что я немного схожу с ума.
description.turkish: Even I feel I am going a bit mad.
description.vietnamese: Even I feel I am going a bit mad.
description.latam: Even I feel I am going a bit mad.
description.brazilian: Até eu sinto que estou ficando um pouco louco.
description.indonesian: Bahkan saya merasa saya akan sedikit gila.
description.tchinese: 連我自己都覺得自己快要瘋了。

displayName.japanese: もう一つの大きなもの。
ドビュッシーはお嫌いですか？

displayName.german: Was ist das für ein Piepen?
displayName.french: Qu'est-ce que c'est que ce bip ?
displayName.portuguese: O que é que está a apitar?

description.english: You might want to check your smoke detectors.
description.german: Vielleicht sollten Sie Ihre Rauchmelder überprüfen.
description.spanish: Es posible que desee comprobar sus detectores de humo.
description.french: Vous pouvez également vérifier vos détecteurs de fumée.
description.italian: Si consiglia di controllare i rilevatori di fumo.
description.dutch: Misschien wilt u uw rookmelders controleren.
description.japanese: 煙探知機をチェックしたほうがいいかもしれない。
description.portuguese: É melhor verificar os detectores de fumo.
description.czech: Možná byste měli zkontrolovat detektory kouře.
description.greek: Ίσως να θέλετε να ελέγξετε τους ανιχνευτές καπνού σας.
description.norwegian: Det kan være lurt å sjekke røykvarslerne.
description.schinese: 您可能需要检查一下烟雾探测器。
description.swedish: Du kanske vill kontrollera dina rökdetektorer.
description.russian: Возможно, вам стоит проверить детекторы дыма.
description.turkish: You might want to check your smoke detectors.
description.vietnamese: You might want to check your smoke detectors.
description.latam: You might want to check your smoke detectors.
description.brazilian: Talvez queira verificar seus detectores de fumaça.
description.indonesian: Anda mungkin ingin memeriksa detektor asap Anda.
description.tchinese: 您可能需要檢查煙霧偵測器。
